title: I have a Pixel 4a (5G) from USA. I live in India. Got an error when I tried to activate eSIM
content: I have a Pixel 4a (5G) from USA. I live in India. Got an error when I tried to activate eSIM. It says that IMEI number does not support eSIM. Is there any way to change the configuration of IMEI number so that it will support Indian carrier.
